text: @realDonaldTrump First thing you tweet about on #Juneteenth is your loss on DACA.  And you completely ignore the rising cases of covid19. The virus is not going away you fool.  It is heading towards another shut down. You only have 4 1/2 months left in office and you are causing so much damage.

entity.name: Juneteenth
entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
